languages.text: Барк от Капитана, стадия абордажа 2, барк 3.

traits.locale_text: Барк от Капитана, стадия абордажа 2, барк 3.

languages.text: "Ах да, к нам пожаловал{rt_mf||а} еще и Вольный Торговец. Украсьте отсек {rt_mf|его|ее} кишками, ребятки!"
"Ah yes, a Rogue Trader has also decided to grace us with {rt_mf|his|her} presence. Deck the bay with {rt_mf|his|her} innards!"
languages.original_text: "Ах да, к нам пожаловал{rt_mf||а} еще и Вольный Торговец. Украсьте отсек {rt_mf|его|ее} кишками, ребятки!"

traits.locale_text: "Oh yeah, the Rogue Trader has graced us with {mf|his|her} presence. Deck the halls with {mf|his|her} innards, mateys!"
"Oh yeah, the Rogue Trader has graced us with {mf|his|her} presence. Deck the halls with {mf|his|her} innards, mateys!"
"Oh yeah! The Rogue Trader has decided to grace us with {mf|his|her} presence. Deck the halls with {mf|his|her} innards, mateys!"
"Oh yeah! The Rogue Trader has decided to grace us with {mf|his|her} presence. Deck the halls with {mf|his|her} innards, mateys!"
"Ah yes, a Rogue Trader has also decided to grace us with {rt_mf|his|her} presence. Deck the bay with {rt_mf|his|her} innards!"
"Ah yes, a Rogue Trader has also decided to grace us with {rt_mf|his|her} presence. Deck the bay with {rt_mf|his|her} innards!"
"Ah yes, a Rogue Trader has also decided to grace us with {rt_mf|his|her} presence. Deck the bay with {rt_mf|his|her} innards!"

languages.text: "Ah ja, {rt_mf|ein Freihändler|eine Freihändlerin} beehrt uns ebenfalls mit {rt_mf|seiner|ihrer} Gegenwart. Verteilt {rt_mf|seine|ihre} Innereien auf dem Deck!"
languages.original_text: "Ah yes, a Rogue Trader has also decided to grace us with {rt_mf|his|her} presence. Deck the bay with {rt_mf|his|her} innards!"

traits.locale_text: "Ah ja, {mf|ein Freihändler|eine Freihändlerin} beehrt uns ebenfalls mit {mf|seiner|ihrer} Gegenwart. Verteilt {mf|seine|ihre} Innereien auf dem Deck!"

languages.text: « Ah, {rt_mf|un libre-marchand|une libre-marchande} a également décidé de nous faire l'honneur de sa présence. Décorez la baie avec ses entrailles ! »
languages.original_text: "Ah yes, a Rogue Trader has also decided to grace us with {rt_mf|his|her} presence. Deck the bay with {rt_mf|his|her} innards!"

traits.locale_text: « Ah, {mf|un libre-marchand|une libre-marchande} a également décidé de nous faire l'honneur de sa présence. Décorez la baie avec ses entrailles ! »

languages.text: «Por cierto, {rt_mf|un|una} Comerciante Independiente también ha decidido honrarnos con su presencia. ¡Adornad el compartimento con sus tripas!».
languages.original_text: "Ah yes, a Rogue Trader has also decided to grace us with {rt_mf|his|her} presence. Deck the bay with {rt_mf|his|her} innards!"

traits.locale_text: «Por cierto, {mf|un|una} Comerciante Independiente también ha decidido honrarnos con su presencia. ¡Adornad el compartimento con sus tripas!».

languages.text: “太好了，行商浪人出现了，让这条小船蓬荜生辉！来，用{rt_mf|他|她}的内脏来装点甲板吧！”
languages.original_text: "Ah yes, a Rogue Trader has also decided to grace us with {rt_mf|his|her} presence. Deck the bay with {rt_mf|his|her} innards!"

traits.locale_text: “太好了，行商浪人出现了，让这条小船蓬荜生辉！来，用{mf|他|她}的内脏来装点甲板吧！”

languages.text: 「ああ、そうだ。ローグトレーダー様もわざわざご臨席くださるらしいぞ。奴の内臓で湾を飾ってやれ！」
languages.original_text: "Ah yes, a Rogue Trader has also decided to grace us with {rt_mf|his|her} presence. Deck the bay with {rt_mf|his|her} innards!"

traits.locale_text: 「ああ、そうだ。ローグトレーダー様もわざわざご臨席くださるらしいぞ。奴の内臓で湾を飾ってやれ！」

languages.text: "Hür Tacir teşrif etmiş, varlığıyla şeref vermiş. Güverteyi şunun kanına boyayın!"
languages.original_text: "Ah yes, a Rogue Trader has also decided to grace us with {rt_mf|his|her} presence. Deck the bay with {rt_mf|his|her} innards!"

traits.locale_text: "Hür Tacir teşrif etmiş, varlığıyla şeref vermiş. Güverteyi şunun kanına boyayın!"
